Analyte(s): Streptococcus pyogenes (Group A β-hemolytic Streptococcus, Strep A)
Specimen Container(s): ESwab collection device (flocked swab in Liquid Amies medium)
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Cepheid Xpert Xpress Strep A rapid real-time PCR assay for qualitative detection of Streptococcus pyogenes in throat swab specimens
Indications for Use Summary: Rapid, qualitative in vitro diagnostic test for detection of Streptococcus pyogenes (Group A β-hemolytic Streptococcus, Strep A) DNA in throat swab specimens from patients with signs and symptoms of pharyngitis, as an aid in diagnosis of Group A Streptococcal pharyngitis; not for treatment monitoring.
